name: ERAProtectDoorbell
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The ERA Protect Doorbell Skill enables you to listen to the announcements of your ERA Doorbell on Echo devices.
 
To get started, enable the ERA Protect Doorbell Skill and link your ERA Protect account to manage your Doorbell with Alexa. 
 
You can edit the Doorbell to a name of your choice .

You can select on which Echo devices you want to hear the doorbell announcements.

You can enable/disable the announcements and select the doorbell sound from the list in your Alexa app.
 
We hope you'll love the ERA Protect Doorbell Skill. Your feedback is valuable and we'd love to hear from you. If you have questions or comments, please e-mail us at support@eraprotect.com.
